thread.title: Universal Rx Celebrates 20 Years in Prescription Benefit Management
thread.title_full: Universal Rx Celebrates 20 Years in Prescription Benefit Management

author: admin
title: Universal Rx Celebrates 20 Years in Prescription Benefit Management
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 1:07 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Universal Rx 
ROANOKE, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Universal Rx of Roanoke, Virginia celebrates a major milestone this month, 20 years of service in the Prescription Benefit Management industry. Established in 1995, Universal Rx started with a vision to provide companies with pharmacy benefit solutions that offer business value alongside unsurpassed customer service and improved outcomes. 
As the health insurance marketplace continues to change, Universal Rx recognizes that adaptive and distinctive solutions are paramount. These solutions include: customized prescription benefit management for self-insured and fully-insured clients such as employers and insurance companies; a national discount prescription program, called Points of Care ; and Expatriate Prescription Services , an international prescription concierge service for overseas residents. 
In 2005, Universal Rx identified a market shift in healthcare — a rapidly growing expatriate population for U.S. corporations. As a result, Universal Rx pioneered an innovative solution designed to provide expatriates convenient access to high quality, low cost prescription medications. Expatriate Prescription Services (EPS) focuses on group prescription plans that have United States based employees along with expatriates living overseas. Universal Rx tailors plans to meet the needs of those in the U.S. and outside. 
“Universal Rx has been able to service a variety of plan members over the last twenty years and we are fortunate to have seen success during each year in business. We’re proud to serve employers and expatriates around the world and provide specialized attention to each member, which sets us apart in the industry. We are positioned for continued growth and remain true to the core value and vision on which the company was founded; concierge level service solutions, innovation, and integrity,” says Jan Sessor, President. 
Mr. Sessor offers over 23 years of experience exclusively in the prescription benefit management industry. The profound customer intimacy and knowledge by which Universal Rx builds its reputation has allowed the company to continually excel and exceed customer expectations by offering a worldwide solution. 
Please visit www.universalrx.com for more information. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929006851/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
